casebody.data:
IN RE HENRRY P. B.-P. Supreme Court of Connecticut. Decided April 12, 2017 Charles D. Ray and Enelsa Diaz, in support of the petition.

The petition by the petitioners Reyna A. and Henrry P. B.-P. for certification for appeal from the Appellate Court, 171 Conn. App. 393 , 156 A.3d 673 (2017), is granted, limited to the following issue:

"Did the Appellate Court properly affirm the Superior Court's dismissal of the petitioners' appeals on April 22, 2016 and September 26, 2016, from the Probate Court orders?"

D'AURIA, J., did not participate in the consideration of or decision on this petition.
